description: This Python test source file uses pytest fixtures and test functions to verify the functionality of the ExpressTemplate within a project initialization context, involving configuration loading, template processing, project structure creation, and script execution.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for project parameters, including name, version, description, author, project type, output path, and additional parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration of supported project types, used to specify the kind of project being initialized, e.g., EXPRESS.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Structure containing initialization information for templates, including commands for environment configuration, build, install, run, and openapi generation.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for initializing projects based on templates, managing template factory, loading configurations, executing scripts, and verifying post-processions.

classes.name: TemplateProvider
classes.description: Provides templates from specified locations, facilitating template creation and management.

classes.name: ExpressTemplate
classes.description: Template class for Express.js projects, providing project-specific initialization info and processing logic.

methods.name: get_init_info
methods.description: Returns the TemplateInitInfo object with commands and settings necessary to initialize an Express project.

methods.name: initialize_project
methods.description: Executes the project initialization process, including template deployment, configuration, executing scripts, and post-processing.

methods.name: wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Waits for confirmation that post-processing scripts have finished executing.

methods.name: load_config
methods.description: Class method to load project configuration from JSON or YAML files.
